clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in coronary artery disease inflammatory disorders unspecified and rheumatoid arthritis

contraindications.disease: good tolerability with three months of treatment
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: VX 703 is an anti cytokine therapy in which p38 MAP kinase inhibitor effectively inhibits LPS stimulated TNF alpha IL 6 and IL 1 beta production
